name: Our Beautiful Land
description:
Our beautiful land is a prototype developed from scratch by students for the competition Game Lab of Ubisoft.

The theme of the competition was "Change the world".  A polar bear must survive while his land is changing and seals disapear slowly.

This is a puzzle game where the two players have to help each others to reach the hibernation site.

Programmers

  • Jean-René Choinière
  • Maxime Larivière
  • Dimitry Kolytchev

Playtest

  • Julien Thibault

Art and Game design

  • Jean-Philippe Bertrand
  • Julie Quach
  • Annie-Claude Bergeron
  • Yohannak Tim

Sound Designer

  • William Sylvain
